data.pricing_trends: Prices tend to be lower in the rainy season but are seeing an overall upward trend due to increasing demand. Flights and hotel rates spike during the peak travel months.
data.booking_windows: Itâ€™s advisable to book flights and accommodations at least 2-3 months in advance to secure the best rates, especially for travel during the dry season.
data.demand: An increasing interest in eco-tourism and cultural experiences, particularly among travelers seeking unique adventures and historical insights.
data.competition: Alternative destinations like Costa Rica and Belize compete for the same eco-conscious travelers, increasing the need for strategic pricing and unique offerings.
